document_data.name: ''Knight Vision Goggles''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Knight Vision Goggles''''' were [[enchanted]] [[goggles]] that likely fell into the possession of several [[adventurer]]s in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: This [[Magic|magical]] item took the form of goggles used for eye protection while working in workshops.
document_data.Powers: Using this item allowed the owner to look like a knight and nullify one attack. However, this ability had varying recovery periods before it could be used again.
document_data.History: In the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], such goggles could be found in [[Neverwinter]], [[Gauntlgrym]], [[Mount Hotenow]], and [[Neverwinter Wood]]. They were also available for purchase at shops in those locations. Such items were likely found by the adventurers that stopped [[Deathsleep]], the [[green dragon]].
